author.bio: No reason for me to be here anymore. If you’re interested in anime art ping me and maybe I’ll respond.

body:
> "tired after a day of work lets see where I can find a good community and have some fun talking to others"

> "you're subhuman"

> "no I'm not"

> "you love x group I categorize as subhuman"

> "stop being childish and having a narrow view about things"

> "shut up x group lover"

> "alright I don't want to see toxicity, whats a good way to do that. Oh right! Block them!"

> "lol you're fragile"

Thats your entire conversation. People aren't obligated to listen to retarded opinions and are free to block them. Ruqqus is a wide community and not just "x group of people are subhuman".
body_html:
"tired after a day of work lets see where I can find a good community and have some fun talking to others"

"you're subhuman"

"no I'm not"

"you love x group I categorize as subhuman"

"stop being childish and having a narrow view about things"

"shut up x group lover"

"alright I don't want to see toxicity, whats a good way to do that. Oh right! Block them!"

"lol you're fragile"

Thats your entire conversation. People aren't obligated to listen to retarded opinions and are free to block them. Ruqqus is a wide community and not just "x group of people are subhuman".
